1.name: Intelligence Network
1.desc: In each game, if you select the Infiltrate option in the Scouting step, you can use that option one additional time during the first Turning Point.

2.name: Surveillance System
2.desc: In each game, if you select the Recon option in the Scouting step, you can use that option one additional time when resolving your selection.

3.name: Expanded Armoury
